#summary renderPageToString([action,layout,cache,controller])
#labels api,0.8,controller,request

*Description*:

Includes the view page for the specified controller and action and returns it as a string.

*Return Type*:

String

*

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

||   || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *action* || string || false || #variables.params.action# || Pass-through argument; see documentation for renderPage ||
|| *layout* || any || false || true || Pass-through argument; see documentation for renderPage ||
|| *cache* || any || false ||  || Pass-through argument; see documentation for renderPage ||
|| *controller* || string || false || #variables.params.controller# || Pass-through argument; see documentation for renderPage ||

*Usage*:

-

*Examples*:

{{{
<cfset response = renderPageToString(layout=false)>

}}}

 * RenderingPages (chapter)

 * [renderNothing renderNothing()] (function)
 * [renderText renderText()] (function)
 * [renderPartial renderPartial()] (function)
